programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Onde os Homens São Homens, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: No início do século XX John McCabe, homem de passado misterioso, vai até um remoto povoado do oeste americano para montar o primeiro prostíbulo da comunidade.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: No Rastro da Morte, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Cowan procura pelo seu amigo de infância Catlow, mas revela-se que Cowan é um oficial de polícia e a relação entre ambos não será nada fácil. Catlow é um ladrão, que junto com seus homens, reuniu gado sem marcar e planeja vendê-lo em Abilene.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: O Dólar Furado, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Estados Unidos, segunda metade do século 19. Gary O'Hara é um ex-capitão do Exército dos Estados Confederados.

programme.title: Quando Explode a Vingança, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Juan Miranda é um camponês rude com coração de Robin Hood. Sean Mallory é um revolucionário irlandês que é especialista em dinamite e vive agora no México.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, é escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem é perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, começa uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: A Cura de Todo Mal, (1949, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Johnny é um carismático pregador, que viaja ao lado de sua namorada por todos os Estados Unidos, visitando igrejas e enganando as pessoas ao dizer que possui poderes de cura, até o dia em que ele descobre que os seus poderes são reais.

programme.title: 100 Dias de Resistencia, (2017, War Drama)
programme.desc: Zilan, uma jovem, retorna à sua cidade natal em busca dos vestígios de seu irmão morto, assassinado pelo Estado Islâmico.

programme.title: Mentira Nada Inocente, (2021, Crime)
programme.desc: Em busca de atenção e ganho financeiro, Katie, uma estudante de dança, finge que tem câncer e faz todos a sua volta acreditarem que está lutando contra a doença.

programme.title: O Muro, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmado durante 10 dias em um local ativo de travessia a 30 milhas ao norte da fronteira mexicana, O Muro é a história de uma amizade incomum entre uma imigrante sem documentos.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio a uma catástrofe biológica que ameaça destruir a raça humana, as histórias de três casais se cruzam quando eles são forçados a tomar decisões difíceis que definirão seu futuro.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes começa a filmar fenômenos estranhos. Mas eles não sabem que só conseguirão a atenção desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Busca de Vingança, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em um conto clássico de Edgar Allan Poe, este filme desafia a percepção da realidade. Busca de Vingança nos mostra como Edgar torna se uma força de terror contra qualquer um que está entre ele e seu desejo de vingança.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Nazistas no Centro da Terra, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Pesquisadores na Antártica são sequestrados por uma equipe de tropas mascaradas. Eles são arrastados no subsolo para um continente escondido no centro da terra.

programme.title: O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, começa a se mover com o poder da Jóia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a múmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos

programme.title: Sango é convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrás. Kuranosuke tem aparência, status e riqueza. Sango está confusa sobre como ela recusará sua proposta de casamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A Tessaiga está equipada com uma técnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roubá-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga

programme.title: Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolverá Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai até o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presença da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin

programme.title: Narak está tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak vê que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna aos dias atuais. Ela está ocupada se preparando para um simulado de dois dias. Enquanto isso, Sango está preocupada com Kohaku, que foi levado por Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conexão Entre o Presente e a Época das Guerras

programme.title: Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que é sua noiva. Mas Kuga é loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrás dele e é atacada por um youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Youkai Loba e a Grande Promessa

programme.title: Ayame leva Kuga para parar a luta de seus companheiros. Mas ela não tem intenção de retornar para ele. O youkai que estava atrás dos fragmentos da Jóia ataca. Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Proposta de Casamento Super Veloz

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo conhecem uma senhora que é uma falsa exorcista. A fim de descobrir por que tantos youkais apareceram recentemente, eles vão ao Castelo que parece ser a origem desse problema.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Aumento da Energia Maligna; A Cabeça do Demônio

programme.title: Inuyasha luta contra o senhor do Castelo. Sango ouve que Mirok foi para o porão com a princesa e vai atrás dele. Agome encontra o cadáver da verdadeira princesa no quarto do lorde.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Enquanto procura por Narak, Kikyo conhece Kansuke, um velho bandido que está gravemente doente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo aceitam um trabalho para se livrar dos macacos, que estão destruindo campos. Eles encontram três macacos, Gon, Bun e Ken.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Três Youkais do Deus Macaco

programme.title: Agome pega um resfriado e retorna aos dias atuais. Inuyasha está preocupado com ela. Ele reúne muitos alimentos nutritivos derrotando vários youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Confronto Entre Inuyasha e Hojo

programme.title: O irmão mais novo de Agome, Sota, se apaixonou por Hitomi, uma colega de classe. Inicialmente, ele pede a Inuyasha um conselho, mas no final, ele decide dizer a ela que a ama com um plano orquestrado por Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Tesso, um youkai de rato que tem medo de gatos, se transforma em um curandeiro e persegue Kuroro. Inuyasha e seu grupo encontram aldeões que confundem Kirara com Kuroro e tentam expulsá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Espiritualista Mistérioso e a Kirara Negra

programme.title: Kikyo foi trazida de volta à vida por uma das técnicas secretas de Urasue. Ela conhece Monju, que está na mesma situação. Monju não tem almas suficientes.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.title: Agome e os outros são sequestrados por youkais que estão usando falsas Jóias. Inuyasha vai salvá-los, mas Gyu-Oh fica em seu caminho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles estão presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha está lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Pesadelo Real! A Luta na Floresta do Desespero

programme.title: A neve está caindo fora de época. Mirok é sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caçador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vão procurá-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sete Anos Depois; As Neves Eternas

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Lobos são Atacados por um Zumbi

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No templo, Inuyasha verifica se Agome e os outros estão seguros. Ele acaba confiando em Renkotsu e Ginkotsu o bombardeia. Inuyasha os enfrenta, mas Renkotsu rouba os fragmentos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Determinado a ingressar na máfia, Giorno vai à prisão falar com Polpo, um dos principais membros da Passione, e recebe um teste de iniciação impossível.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Conheça o gângster atrás do muro

programme.title: Giorno luta contra o Stand de Polpo, que pode se movimentar livremente pelas sombras. Koichi conta a Giorno sobre a flecha que produz um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando a notícia do tesouro escondido de Polpo se espalha entre os membros da Passione, Bucciarati e seu bando partem para pegá-lo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Em busca da fortuna de Polpo!

programme.title: Com o desaparecimento misterioso da tripulação de Bucciarati no convés, Abbacchio lança seu Stand, Moody Jazz, para investigar esse preocupante fenômeno.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O bando descobre que sua chegada a Capri reserva um perigo. Com Giorno, Mista começa a neutralizar o inimigo com seu Stands, o Six Bullets.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mista é atraído para um caminhão em movimento. Nele, o Stand de Sale, Arts & Crafts, mostra sua habilidade de controlar as balas do Six Bullet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati entrega as joias de Polpo ao Chefe, Pericolo, e é promovido a caporegime da Passione.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Durante uma operação, Narancia é interceptado por Formaggio, membro do Time de Assassinos, que encolhe o capanga usando os poderes de Tiny Feet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Narancia, cada vez menor, tenta se manter vivo enquanto Formaggio continua a pressioná-lo para descobrir o paradeiro da filha do chefe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati envia Giorno e seus homens para as ruínas de Pompeia, onde um confronto com Illuso prende Fugo em um mundo de espelhos sem seu Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Abbacchio tenta recuperar a chave para transferir a filha do chefe para um lugar seguro, mas antes ele precisa enfrentar Illuso no mundo dos espelhos.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com ordens para embarcar em um trem com destino a Florença, a equipe de Bucciarati não conseguem descobrir como usar a chave, e os assassinos estão se aproximando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A equipe de Bucciarati está envelhecendo rápido por causa de um ataque desconhecido. Mista aparece para investigar, mas logo é surpreendido por um Stand Beach Boy.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Comovido com a determinação do agonizante Prosciutto em manter seu Stand Thankful Death ativado, Pesci decide enfrentar Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Merone usa o corpo de uma jovem para gerar um Stand e o envia atrás de Trish, que dá sinais de ser uma usuária de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Babyhead tenta fazer picadinho de Giorno por meio da manipulação da matéria. Giorno revida usando os poderes de geração de vida do Golden Wind.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Fantasma, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A história começa como uma expedição à ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido à sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raça humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival à altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!

programme.title: As Fantásticas Aventuras de Spirou e Fantásio, (2018, Comedy)
programme.desc: Spirou, ladrão disfarçado como mensageiro de hotel, se familiariza com Fantasio, um jornalista competitivo.

programme.title: Os Sete Corvos, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em dois contos de fadas dos irmãos Grimm - Os Sete Corvos e Os Seis Cisnes.

programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: O Fantasma, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A história começa como uma expedição à ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido à sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raça humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival à altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!

programme.title: As Fantásticas Aventuras de Spirou e Fantásio, (2018, Comedy)
programme.desc: Spirou, ladrão disfarçado como mensageiro de hotel, se familiariza com Fantasio, um jornalista competitivo.

programme.title: Os Sete Corvos, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em dois contos de fadas dos irmãos Grimm - Os Sete Corvos e Os Seis Cisnes.

programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: Meu “Querido” Elfo, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Uma mãe solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mítica – um elfo doméstico – vive no apartamento há séculos. Os novos donos da casa precisarão fazer amizade com o elfo, cuja tarefa é justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Combate, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um jovem lutador deve decidir seu destino; desistir de tudo e treinar para honra e glória ou sucumbir à vida de um lutador de jaula por um mafioso russo.

programme.title: The Rose Tattoo, (1955, Romance)
programme.desc: A neighborhood is disturbed when truck driver Rosario is killed by police. One day, his wife learns of Rosario's affair, and a new carefree, handsome Italian truck driver enters her life.

programme.title: The Bells Of St Mary's, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

programme.title: The World of Henry Orient, (1964, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers stars as a hilariously seedy concert pianist who is nearly driven mad after he becomes the obsession of two crush-crazed schoolgirls in this poignant, funny look at innocence lost. Angela Lansbury and Paula Prentiss also star.

programme.title: That's My Boy, (1951, Comedy)
programme.desc: An athletic father tries to press his hypochondriac teenage son to follow in his footsteps.

programme.title: The Caddy, (1953, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this zany farce, Harvey is a shy but talented pro golfer who, because he can't face the crowds, coaxes his buddy Joe into a big-time tournament. As Joe's caddy, Harvey is a disaster, and the two have a hilarious quarrel.

programme.title: The Stooge, (1953, Comedy)
programme.desc: Money isn't everything and Bill Miller proves it. He's carved out a modest niche as a singer in the off-vaudeville circuit. But suddenly his act is big news.

programme.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum, (1966, Comedy)
programme.desc: Zero Mostel, Buster Keaton, Phil Silvers and an all-star cast scam their way through this boisterous romp amidst gorgeous girls, mistaken identities, stunning surprises, cunning disguises and great Sondheim songs.

programme.title: The Odd Couple, (1968, Screwball)
programme.desc: Two divorced men decide to share a New York apartment. Fussy Felix, fastidious to a fault. He proves that cleanliness is next to insanity. And Oscar, who wreaks havoc on a tidy room with the speed and thoroughness of a tornado.

programme.title: The Fortune Cookie, (1966, Screwball)
programme.desc: In their very first screen pairing, Walter Matthau (who would win a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his performance) and Jack Lemmon portray a crooked lawyer and his TV cameraman brother-in-law in this madcap tale of greed and recouping lost love.

programme.title: Raw Deal, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Dismissed some time ago from the FBI, Mark Kaminsky is contacted by his old boss, Shannon, whose son has been murdered. Shannon needs Kaminsky's help and offers to re-instate him if he is successful.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Escape Plan, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, and 50 Cent star as inmates who must break out of a top secret, high-security prison in this non-stop action-thriller.

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Years after he fought his way out of prison, Ray Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from to save his friend from the prison’s brutal human battleground, known as Hades.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Secret Window, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award® nominee Johnny Depp (2003 Best Actor, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl) gives his most riveting performance in this action/suspense thriller featuring a top-notch cast.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: An obese attorney accidentally runs down and kills an old gypsy woman. After her ancient father puts a curse on him, he starts losing weight, and cannot stop. Based on the Stephen King novel, written under the pseudonym Richard Bachman.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (1989, Horror)
programme.desc: For most families, moving is a new beginning. But for the Creeds, it could be the beginning of the end. Because they've just moved in next door to a place that children built with broken dreams, the Pet Sematary.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Secret Window, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award® nominee Johnny Depp (2003 Best Actor, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl) gives his most riveting performance in this action/suspense thriller featuring a top-notch cast.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shigechi's Harvest, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke and friends try to cash in the winning lottery ticket they found. However, the bank clerk is not convinced they’re the actual owners of the ticket, placing the three teens into a tough spot as they try to talk their way through their big lie.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Dreams of Cinderella
programme.desc: Yukako, depressed because she can’t get Koichi to return her feelings, comes across a beauty salon where the owner claims a special beauty treatment will help customers find love and happiness…

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 1
programme.desc: A man named Yoshikage Kira is enjoying his lunch break at the park with a sandwich in hand. But his peaceful afternoon is cut short when Shigechi accidentally takes Kira’s sandwich bag, believing it to be his own.
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 1

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.sub-title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King dodges Netero's onslaught as he plans his own attack.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.sub-title: Unparalleled Joy x And x Unconditional Love

programme.desc: Koichi and Hazamada visit the home of Rohan Kishibe, a popular manga artist whom they are huge fans of. Much to their joy, Rohan not only agrees to sign autographs but also invites them to take a tour of his workspace.
programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2

programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu become friends with a Stand user named Shigekiyo Yangu, a.k.a. Shigechi, who can use his Stand to find and collect the money that is scattered across town. Impressed by the boy’s abilities.

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start all bets are off!

programme.title: Black Dynamite, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: An all-star cast led by Michael Jai White is featured in this 1970s-style blaxploitation action film about the legendary super crime fighter "Black Dynamite."

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start all bets are off!

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn, (1989, Thriller)
programme.desc: Xavier Quinn is the police chief of a tiny Caribbean island. He is on good terms with all. When a prominent businessman is murdered, Quinn, like everyone else, believes that the killer is Maubee--a local folk hero and Quinn's childhood friend.

programme.title: Jackie Brown, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A female flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: City Hunter, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Extremely silly comedy about a self-indulgent private investigator who winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.

programme.title: Police Story: Lockdown, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: While visiting his estranged daughter at a nightclub, a police captain must spring into action when an elaborate kidnapping plan unravels right before his eyes.

programme.title: Wheels On Meals, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: Action-packed and full of fun, set off on a wacky adventure with kung-fu fighting cousins Thomas and David whose simple life running a fast-food van in Spain is turned upside down by the beautiful pickpocket Sylvia.

programme.title: Jackie Chan's Project A, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Dragon Ma a lieutenant in the 19th-century Hong Kong marines battles Pirates that have been terrorizing local waters in this must-see adrenaline-pumping adventure delivers all the intense thrills and witty fun that Jackie Chan fans demand!

programme.title: Jackie Chan's Project A2 (A Gai Waak Juk Jaap), (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Dragon Mao is assigned to lead the local police force but soon discovers that police corruption is running wild right under his nose. When he's framed for a jewelry robbery, Dragon Mao must fight to clear his name.

programme.title: Operation Condor, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan ignites the big screen as the world's greatest secret agent, code name Condor. Sent to track down stolen Nazi gold, he is pursued by a ruthless band of treasure-hunting terrorists on a globe-spanning quest to reach the bounty first!

programme.title: Operation Condor II: The Armour Of The Gods, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan is a fortune hunter whose ex-girlfriend is kidnapped by an evil cult! Things kick into high gear when her fiancée, an old friend of Jackie’s, asks him for help in securing the kidnappers’ lone demand: the priceless Armor of The Gods!

programme.title: Kickboxer, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: When kickboxing champ Eric Sloane is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt, seeks vengeance.

programme.title: Kickboxer 2: The Road Back, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: In this rousing sequel to Kickboxer, Tong Po broods about his defeat at the hands of Kurt Sloan. Po and his managers resort to drastic measures to goad Kurt into the ring for a rematch.

programme.title: Grown Ups, (2010, Screwball)
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July 4th celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2, (2013, Screwball)
programme.desc: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny (Adam Sandler) finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, wild bus drivers, cops on skis and 400 costumed party crashers, sometimes crazy follows you.

programme.title: The House Bunny, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: When Shelley gets kicked out of the mansion, she's lost in the wilds of Beverly Hills until she stumbles upon the sorriest sorority on campus. Now it's up to her to spruce up the girls and heat up the Zeta house before the University shuts them down.

programme.title: Easy A, (2010, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a clean cut high school girl (Emma Stone) sees her reputation tarnished until she decides to use the rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds, (2002, Screwball)
programme.desc: Funnyman Adam Sandler stars in MR. DEEDS, the hilarious remake of the classic American comedy Mr. Deeds Goes to Town.

programme.title: Jack and Jill, (2011, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jack Sadelstein (Adam Sandler) is successful and has the perfect family, but he dreads one event each year: the annual visit of his twin sister Jill (also Adam Sandler). Things spin out of control when Jill decides to extend her visit, permanently!

programme.title: Just Go With It, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After telling his girlfriend that he's married as a means of avoiding real commitment, a plastic surgeon must recruit a fake family to prove his honesty.

programme.title: Hitch, (2004, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Meet Hitch, New York City's greatest matchmaker. Love is his job and he'll get you the girl of your dreams in just three easy dates, guaranteed!

programme.title: Grown Ups, (2010, Screwball)
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July 4th celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: The coming-of-age of three best friends who work at a pizzeria in the seaside town of Mystic, Connecticut.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Pretty In Pink, (1986, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: She’s a high school girl from the wrong side of town. He’s the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, it’s threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Autumn In New York, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: Autumn in New York follows the sexual exploits of Will Keane (RICHARD GERE) until he runs into an unexpected dead end when he meets Charlotte Fielding (WINONA RYDER). Charlotte is half Will's age and twice his match.

programme.title: Untamed Heart, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Two of today's hottest young actors, Christian Slater and Marisa Tomei, star in this tender romance about lonely souls destined to find one another. Co-starring Rosie Perez.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding, (1997, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Commitment-shy Jules Potter reluctantly realizes she is in love with her best friend Michael. There is just one catch: he's about to marry someone else. Jules will do anything to steal him back... except tell him the simple truth.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: The Russia House, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: From the pen of master spy novelist John LeCarre comes this riveting tale in which a British publisher (Sean Connery) and a beautiful Russian editor (Michele Pfeiffer) are sucked into the deadly world of espionage.

programme.title: Along Came A Spider, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: After the harrowing death of his partner, detective and best-selling author Alex Cross has retreated to the peace of retirement. But when a brilliant criminal (Michael Wincott) kidnaps a senator’s young daughter, Alex is lured back into action.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty, (2012, War Drama)
programme.desc: For a decade, an elite team of intelligence and military operatives, working in secret across the globe, devoted themselves to a single goal: to find and eliminate Osama bin Laden. ZERO DARK THIRTY tells the story of history's greatest manhunt.

programme.title: Along Came A Spider, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: After the harrowing death of his partner, detective and best-selling author Alex Cross has retreated to the peace of retirement. But when a brilliant criminal (Michael Wincott) kidnaps a senator’s young daughter, Alex is lured back into action.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty, (2012, War Drama)

programme.title: Fair Game, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: A riveting thriller inspired by the experiences of real-life CIA officer Valerie Plame, whose identity was revealed after her husband questioned the U.S. involvement in Iraq.

programme.title: I'm Not There, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: The life of Bob Dylan is examined through multiple variations of his own personality and career, as played by a series of different actors.

programme.title: Wuthering Heights, (2011, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: The greatest love story ever told, Wuthering Heights is an excitingly fresh and distinct take on the classic novel by Emily Brontë.

programme.title: Trumbo, (2007, Documentary)
programme.desc: Trumbo documents the rise of Dalton Trumbo's career in Hollywood, and his subsequent public humiliation from being among the "Hollywood Ten" blacklisted by the House Un-American Activities Committee in the 1940s for communist associations.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.title: The Illusionist, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tom is a young man who believes it's better to be a fake somebody than a real nobody. Finally, A wealthy American shipbuilder hires Tom to travel to Italy to bring back his playboy son.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts stars as a novice art history professor with a surprising lesson plan that inspires her students to open their eyes to love and life.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Forsaken (2014), (2016, Action)
programme.desc: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father, Reverend Samuel Clayton, while their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

programme.title: The Jade Pendant, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: The Old West becomes a battleground for power and revenge in this gripping epic based on true events. A young Chinese woman, Ying-Ying, finds herself on a boat to America after escaping the clutches of a bad arranged marriage.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Out of Liberty, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: n the winter of 1839, a jailer in Liberty, Missouri, has to watch over the most dangerous men in the state while they await trial. He faces two dangers: the one that comes from the prisoners and the one that lurks behind the walls of the prison.

programme.title: End of the Rope, (2024, Western)
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Sheriff Jacobson and Attorney Taylor investigate the disappearance of the Haven Family while facing a town bent on vengeance against suspect Charles Bannon.

programme.title: Sweet Country, (2018, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Australian western set on the Northern Territory frontier in the 1920s, where justice itself is put on trial when an aged Aboriginal farmhand shoots a white man in self-defense and goes on the run as a posse gathers to hunt him down.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Woman Walks Ahead, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this riveting western follows a headstrong New York widow (Jessica Chastain) as she journeys west to meet Sioux chief Sitting Bull, facing off with an army officer (Sam Rockwell) intent on war with Native Americans.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: After his uncle dies, a young boy learns of his relative's true occupation as an undercover spy and is later recruited to be undercover himself. Based on the novel by Anthony Horowitz.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When evil Archibald Snatcher decides to capture the Boxtrolls – lovable, box-wearing creatures – it’s up to Eggs and his friend Winnie to same them.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Divergent, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A thrilling action-adventure set in a future where Tris Prior (Shailene Woodley) uncovers a conspiracy by a faction leader (Kate Winslet) that will change society forever.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Tris and Four race to unlock the truth about the past in this star-powered, action-packed second adventure from the Divergent series.

programme.title: The Divergent Series The Allegiant, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Beyond the wall, Tris and Four face a threat more dangerous than they ever imagined, fighting for the future of an entire city in this action-packed third Divergent adventure.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Windtalkers, (2002, War Drama)
programme.desc: True story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WW II as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders.

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: The Front Runner, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: American Senator Gary Hart's presidential campaign in 1988 is derailed when he's caught in a scandalous love affair.

programme.title: Multiplicity, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story about a single father and his young son. Finding themselves homeless, he risks everything on an unpaid internship in a highly competitive stockbroker training program, where only one in twenty interns make the grade.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmusch’s ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: State Property, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Beans decides that the only way to grasp the American Dream is to take it. STATE PROPERTY follows Beans and his crew, as they take over the city creating mayhem as their empire builds.

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: Crazy Six, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: In a crumbling Europe, powerful mafia families have emerged from the anarchy to vie for control of the lucrative arms trade.

programme.title: Adrenalin: Fear The Rush, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: The Russian government has collapsed. Amidst the chaos, riots, and struggle for power, a terrible weapon has leaked out. A deadly germ of the cold war has begun to spread across Eastern Europe, killing massive numbers of people.

programme.title: State Property, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Beans decides that the only way to grasp the American Dream is to take it. STATE PROPERTY follows Beans and his crew, as they take over the city creating mayhem as their empire builds.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Bad Ass, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Frank Vega (Danny Trejo) teams up with grumpy old agoraphobic Bernie Pope (Danny Glover) to kick ass and clean up the streets of L.A.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: The activity is back and has claimed a new victim. Jesse has been hearing horrifying sounds from his neighbor’s apartment, but when he sets out to uncover their source, he encounters an ancient evil that won’t rest until it’s claimed his soul.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: For the first time you will SEE the activity... When a new family moves into a familiar house, they discover a mysterious video camera that reveals the presence of a demonic threat and soon find themselves terrorized by an ancient evil.

programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: After over one hundred years of service, The Yankee Pedlar Inn is shutting its doors for good. The last remaining employees - Claire and Luke - are determined to uncover proof of what many believe to be one of New England's most haunted hotels.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: The Possession of Hannah Grace, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a failed Exorcism Megan Reed (Shay Mitchell) is working overnight at the morgue when she takes delivery of a disfigured cadaver. Soon Megan begins to experience horrifying visions and starts to suspect that the body may be possessed by a demon.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: RUN, (2025, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After leaving her fiancé at the altar, Melissa joins friends at a cabin. When Jenny is found mutilated in the woods and aliens attack the nation, the girls must fight to survive.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Action)
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A thrilling misadventure involving three ingenious orphans and a villainous actor named Count Olaf (Jim Carrey) who wants their enormous fortune.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: When four teenagers all meet with mysterious deaths exactly one week after watching a videotape, investigative reporter Rachel Keller tracks down the video... and watches it.

programme.title: Paycheck, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Jennings works on top-secret projects. After each job, his memory is erased. After his latest assignment, he is shocked to be told that he agreed to forfeit all payment, until he receives an envelope containing clues to his forgotten past.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Crime)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: Righteous Kill, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Two veteran New York City detectives (Academy-Award-winners Robert De Niro and Al Pacino) hunt a vigilante who may be one of their own.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: A college professor, who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI, receives a death threat that says he has only 88 minutes to live. To save his life, he must use all his skills and training to narrow down the possible suspects.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: After a seemingly perfectly planned robbery goes awry, a group of criminals begin to suspect there is a traitor in the ranks, and back at their headquarters try to suss out the culprit.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Weekend, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A drunken one-night stand turns into a deeper romance over the course of a booze, drug, and sex-filled weekend.

programme.title: Tangerine, (2015, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Sin-Dee is back. Upon hearing that her pimp boyfriend was unfaithful during the days she was jailed, the sex worker and her friend, Alexandra, set out to get to the bottom of this. Their odyssey leads them through subcultures of Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Bellflower, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: While Woodrow and Aiden prepare for the global apocalypse by crafting homemade flamethrowers and fire breathing Mad Max-inspired muscle cars, Woodrow falls hard in love with a femme fatale who's potentially more dangerous than any end of days.

programme.title: Son of Rambow, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hilariously fresh take on friendship, family, film heroes and the death-defying adventures of growing up in the video age.

programme.title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople, (2016, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Ricky is a defiant young city kid who finds himself on the run with his cantankerous foster uncle in the wild New Zealand bush. A national manhunt ensues, and the two are forced to put aside their differences and work together.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Crime)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Horror)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: An obese attorney accidentally runs down and kills an old gypsy woman. After her ancient father puts a curse on him, he starts losing weight, and cannot stop. Based on the Stephen King novel, written under the pseudonym Richard Bachman.
